displayName: Ensure IAM password policy expires passwords within 90 days or less
rationale: IAM password policies can require passwords to be rotated or expired after a given number of days. It is recommended that the password policy expire passwords after 90 days or less.
recommended_action:
Perform the following to set the password policy as prescribed:
Via AWS Console:
1. Login to AWS Console (with appropriate permissions to View Identity Access
Management Account Settings)
2. Go to IAM Service on the AWS Console
3. Click on Account Settings on the Left Pane
4. Check 'Enable password expiration'
5. Set 'Password expiration period (in days):' to 90 or less
error_message: IAM password policy expiration greater than 90 Days
ruleNames: Ensure IAM password policy expires within 90 days
